title: A Baby's shoe
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: An abandoned baby girl left on the doorstep of a wealthy family by her poor mother finds herself in strange circumstances years later when fate intervenes and she is rescued by a young man from a runaway horse - unbeknownst to her, the man is her brother. Cast includes Florence Lawrence, Owen Moore, Linda Arvidson, George Nichols, Anita Hendrie, Harry Solter, Mack Sennett. Silent film with English intertitles.
